Text: Out of Office AutoReply Enrons Corp Netherlands Site OptionsAs parts of the Enron IT operations are terminated or in the process of being terminated please also copy your email to

Enron Netherlandspst Dear Louise I hope everything is well at your end Given the fact that UBS seems be the buyer of the Enron trading part in the US I was wondering if you think it is worthwhile to think about or discuss an extension to Europe or the Netherlands in particular I am currently still employed by Enron although we are currently in the process of closing down the Enron Amsterdam office I therefore attached my private contact details Best regards Dirk van Vuuren DJ van Vuuren Country Manager Netherlands Enron mobile
